Mega Laser.Description:: Deals massive damage in a straight line in front of your ship. Also destroys bullets.

Mega Bomb.Description: Damages enemies on screen in a large radius
Mega Bomb.Fusion Core:: Deals addtional damage at the center of the blast.

Teleport.Description:: Teleports the ship anywhere on screen
Teleport.Arrival EMP:: destroys bullets in a small radius around your ship upon arrival

Reflex EMP.Description:: Destroys bullets in a moderate radius around your ship
Reflex EMP.Ultimate Description:: deals moderate damage to ships in the radius of the blast

Personal Shield.Description:: Become Invulnerable for a short time.
Personal Shield.Ultimate Description:: reflects enemy laser back at them, dealing considerable damage

Tracking Minigun.Description:: Activates a tracking minigun when charged
Tracking Minigun.Ultimate Description:: shoots homing missiles along with the minigun

Trinity Teleport.Description:: shoots a moderate damage projectile upon arrival
Trinity Teleport.Ultimate Description:: destroys bullets in a small radius around your ship upon arrival

Nightfury.Ultimate Description:: Destroys enemy bullets in its path.
